item.title: Putin announces 3-day ceasefire in May to mark 80 years since WWII victory, Ukraine wants truce now
item.description: Russian President Vladimir Putin declared a three-day ceasefire in May in the war with Ukraine.

item.title: Trump's approval ratings fall as he nears 100 days in office, polls show
item.description: Trump is also losing confidence among voters in his ability to handle immigration.

item.title: White House journalists celebrate the First Amendment at the annual press dinner
item.description: The White House Correspondents' Association's annual dinner on Saturday night celebrated journalists and the First Amendment.
